data.author: Cnn Com Wire Service
data.title: Justice Samuel Alito temporarily extends access to abortion drug while Supreme Court considers case
data.description: Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito on Friday extended a hold on a lower court ruling that would have imposed restrictions on access to an abortion drug, a temporary move meant to give the justices more time to consider the issue.

data.title: Boy’s Suicide in Poland Spurs Backlash Against State Media Tactics
data.description: A public radio station in the city of Szczecin is under fire for helping to identify a 15-year-old sex abuse victim, the son of a local opposition politician, who later killed himself.

data.author: Chris Graham
data.title: Mailbag: How much leeway does Virginia AD Carla Williams give football coach Tony Elliott?
data.description: UVA President Jim Ryan, football coach Tony Elliott and Athletics Director Carla Williams at the groundbreaking for the new Virginia Football Operations Center. Photo: UVA AthleticsI’m one of many who wonder if Tony Elliott is not ready, and Carla Williams picked a shiny new guy rather than someone with HC experience. Not sure Anthony Poindexter would’ve been better, but Tony E has a lot to prove. Do you think Des Kitchings is gone after another terrible offense this season? How much leeway does Carla give Elliott? Three years? Four? What record keeps wolves at bay?– Marc WeathersbyLots...

data.title: Red Cross: Yemen’s warring sides resume releasing prisoners
data.description: SANAA, Yemen (AP) — Hundreds of detainees from Yemen’s conflict were released Saturday as part of a major prisoner exchange that began a day earlier, the International Committee for the Red Cross said. The deal, brokered by the United Nations last month, has been the most significant exchange of prisoners in Years. It comes amid […]
